game_description: EducationXR is an advanced 3D training and education platform. Making education visual and engaging, it enables educators to create, deploy and distribute their immersive creations to VR, mobile, desktop and tablets. Full cross-platform support with cross-device multiplayer sessions, analytics, assessments and even 3D heat-maps for user behavior. Microphone permissions required for multiplayer sessions and voice transmission.
review_1: This is the most awesome thing that I've used in VR. Wow, this is really amazing. Check it out!!!
